parts.text:
[
  {
    "id": "window_title_bar",
    "type": "window_title_bar",
    "region": "top-bar",
    "text": "Sem título 1 — LibreOffice Writer",
    "components": [
      {
        "id": "minimize_button",
        "type": "button",
        "text": "Minimizar",
        "icon": "minimize",
        "actions": ["onClick"]
      },
      {
        "id": "maximize_restore_button",
        "type": "button",
        "text": "Maximizar/Restaurar",
        "icon": "maximize",
        "actions": ["onClick"]
      },
      {
        "id": "close_button",
        "type": "button",
        "text": "Fechar",
        "icon": "close",
        "actions": ["onClick"]
      }
    ]
  },
  {
    "id": "menu_bar",
    "type": "menu_bar",
    "region": "top-bar",
    "components": [
      { "id": "menu_arquivo", "type": "menu_item", "text": "Arquivo", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "menu_editar", "type": "menu_item", "text": "Editar", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "menu_exibir", "type": "menu_item", "text": "Exibir", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "menu_inserir", "type": "menu_item", "text": "Inserir", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "menu_formatar", "type": "menu_item", "text": "Formatar", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "menu_estilos", "type": "menu_item", "text": "Estilos", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "menu_tabela", "type": "menu_item", "text": "Tabela", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "menu_formulario", "type": "menu_item", "text": "Formulário", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "menu_ferramentas", "type": "menu_item", "text": "Ferramentas", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "menu_janela", "type": "menu_item", "text": "Janela", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "menu_ajuda", "type": "menu_item", "text": "Ajuda", "actions": ["onClick"] }
    ]
  },
  {
    "id": "standard_toolbar",
    "type": "toolbar",
    "region": "top-bar",
    "components": [
      { "id": "new_document_button", "type": "button", "icon": "new_document", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "open_document_button", "type": "button", "icon": "open_document", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "save_document_button", "type": "button", "icon": "save_document", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "print_button", "type": "button", "icon": "print", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "print_preview_button", "type": "button", "icon": "print_preview", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "cut_button", "type": "button", "icon": "cut", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "copy_button", "type": "button", "icon": "copy", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "paste_button", "type": "button", "icon": "paste", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "undo_button", "type": "button", "icon": "undo", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "redo_button", "type": "button", "icon": "redo", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "find_replace_button", "type": "button", "icon": "find_replace", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "navigator_button", "type": "button", "icon": "navigator", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "gallery_button", "type": "button", "icon": "gallery", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "styles_button", "type": "button", "icon": "styles", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "table_button", "type": "button", "icon": "table", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "image_button", "type": "button", "icon": "image", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "chart_button", "type": "button", "icon": "chart", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "text_box_button", "type": "button", "icon": "text_box", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "insert_field_button", "type": "button", "icon": "insert_field", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "special_character_button", "type": "button", "icon": "special_character", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "hyperlink_button", "type": "button", "icon": "hyperlink", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "footnote_button", "type": "button", "icon": "footnote", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "comment_button", "type": "button", "icon": "comment", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "track_changes_button", "type": "button", "icon": "track_changes", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "spell_check_button", "type": "button", "icon": "spell_check", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "language_settings_button", "type": "button", "icon": "language_settings", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "help_button", "type": "button", "icon": "help", "actions": ["onClick"] }
    ]
  },
  {
    "id": "formatting_toolbar",
    "type": "toolbar",
    "region": "top-bar",
    "components": [
      {
        "id": "paragraph_style_dropdown",
        "type": "dropdown",
        "text": "Estilo de parágrafo Padrão",
        "value": "Estilo de parágrafo Padrão",
        "actions": ["onChange"]
      },
      { "id": "clear_direct_formatting_button", "type": "button", "icon": "clear_formatting", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "character_button", "type": "button", "icon": "character_settings", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "paragraph_button", "type": "button", "icon": "paragraph_settings", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      {
        "id": "font_family_dropdown",
        "type": "dropdown",
        "text": "Arial",
        "value": "Arial",
        "actions": ["onChange"]
      },
      {
        "id": "font_size_dropdown",
        "type": "dropdown",
        "text": "12 pt",
        "value": "12 pt",
        "actions": ["onChange"]
      },
      { "id": "bold_button", "type": "button", "icon": "bold", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "italic_button", "type": "button", "icon": "italic", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "underline_button", "type": "button", "icon": "underline", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "strikethrough_button", "type": "button", "icon": "strikethrough", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "superscript_button", "type": "button", "icon": "superscript", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "subscript_button", "type": "button", "icon": "subscript", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "font_color_button", "type": "button", "icon": "font_color", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "highlight_color_button", "type": "button", "icon": "highlight_color", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "align_left_button", "type": "button", "icon": "align_left", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "align_center_button", "type": "button", "icon": "align_center", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "align_right_button", "type": "button", "icon": "align_right", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "justify_button", "type": "button", "icon": "justify", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "line_spacing_button", "type": "button", "icon": "line_spacing", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "bullets_button", "type": "button", "icon": "bullets", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "numbering_button", "type": "button", "icon": "numbering", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "decrease_indent_button", "type": "button", "icon": "decrease_indent", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "increase_indent_button", "type": "button", "icon": "increase_indent", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "background_color_button", "type": "button", "icon": "background_color", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "insert_object_button", "type": "button", "icon": "insert_object", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "draw_object_button", "type": "button", "icon": "draw_object", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "insert_shape_button", "type": "button", "icon": "insert_shape", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "insert_line_button", "type": "button", "icon": "insert_line", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "insert_arrow_button", "type": "button", "icon": "insert_arrow", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "insert_rectangle_button", "type": "button", "icon": "insert_rectangle", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "insert_ellipse_button", "type": "button", "icon": "insert_ellipse", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "insert_polygon_button", "type": "button", "icon": "insert_polygon", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "insert_curve_button", "type": "button", "icon": "insert_curve", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "insert_connector_button", "type": "button", "icon": "insert_connector", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "insert_text_button", "type": "button", "icon": "insert_text", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "insert_callout_button", "type": "button", "icon": "insert_callout", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "insert_flowchart_button", "type": "button", "icon": "insert_flowchart", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "insert_star_button", "type": "button", "icon": "insert_star", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "insert_symbol_button", "type": "button", "icon": "insert_symbol", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "insert_3d_object_button", "type": "button", "icon": "insert_3d_object", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "insert_custom_shape_button", "type": "button", "icon": "insert_custom_shape", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "insert_equation_button", "type": "button", "icon": "insert_equation", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "insert_frame_button", "type": "button", "icon": "insert_frame", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "insert_section_button", "type": "button", "icon": "insert_section", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "insert_page_break_button", "type": "button", "icon": "insert_page_break", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "insert_column_break_button", "type": "button", "icon": "insert_column_break", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "insert_manual_break_button", "type": "button", "icon": "insert_manual_break", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "insert_date_time_button", "type": "button", "icon": "insert_date_time", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "insert_page_number_button", "type": "button", "icon": "insert_page_number", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "insert_header_footer_button", "type": "button", "icon": "insert_header_footer", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "insert_bookmark_button", "type": "button", "icon": "insert_bookmark", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "insert_reference_button", "type": "button", "icon": "insert_reference", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "insert_index_button", "type": "button", "icon": "insert_index", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "insert_envelope_button", "type": "button", "icon": "insert_envelope", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "insert_signature_line_button", "type": "button", "icon": "insert_signature_line", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "insert_digital_signature_button", "type": "button", "icon": "insert_digital_signature", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "insert_barcode_button", "type": "button", "icon": "insert_barcode", "actions": ["onClick"] },
      { "id": "insert_qr_code_button", "type": "button", "icon": "insert_qr_code", "actions": ["onClick"] }
    ]
  },
  {
    "id": "horizontal_ruler",
    "type": "ruler",
    "region": "main-content",
    "orientation": "horizontal",
    "units": "cm"
  },
  {
    "id": "document_canvas",
    "type": "text_area",
    "region": "main-content",
    "state": "focused",
    "meta": {
      "cursor_position": "start"
    }
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_panel",
    "type": "sidebar",
    "region": "right-sidebar",
    "components": [
      {
        "id": "sidebar_title",
        "type": "label",
        "text": "Propriedades"
      },
      {
        "id": "sidebar_help_button",
        "type": "button",
        "icon": "help",
        "actions": ["onClick"]
      },
      {
        "id": "sidebar_close_button",
        "type": "button",
        "icon": "close",
        "actions": ["onClick"]
      },
      {
        "id": "sidebar_menu_button",
        "type": "button",
        "icon": "menu",
        "actions": ["onClick"]
      },
      {
        "id": "properties_tab_icon",
        "type": "icon",
        "icon": "properties",
        "state": "selected",
        "actions": ["onClick"]
      },
      {
        "id": "styles_tab_icon",
        "type": "icon",
        "icon": "styles",
        "state": "unselected",
        "actions": ["onClick"]
      },
      {
        "id": "gallery_tab_icon",
        "type": "icon",
        "icon": "gallery",
        "state": "unselected",
        "actions": ["onClick"]
      },
      {
        "id": "navigator_tab_icon",
        "type": "icon",
        "icon": "navigator",
        "state": "unselected",
        "actions": ["onClick"]
      },
      {
        "id": "style_section",
        "type": "collapsible_section",
        "text": "Estilo",
        "state": "expanded",
        "components": [
          {
            "id": "style_dropdown",
            "type": "dropdown",
            "text": "Estilo de parágrafo Padrão",
            "value": "Estilo de parágrafo Padrão",
            "actions": ["onChange"]
          },
          {
            "id": "update_style_button",
            "type": "button",
            "icon": "refresh",
            "actions": ["onClick"]
          },
          {
            "id": "new_style_button",
            "type": "button",
            "icon": "add",
            "actions": ["onClick"]
          }
        ]
      },
      {
        "id": "character_section",
        "type": "collapsible_section",
        "text": "Caractere",
        "state": "expanded",
        "components": [
          {
            "id": "character_font_dropdown",
            "type": "dropdown",
            "text": "Arial",
            "value": "Arial",
            "actions": ["onChange"]
          },
          {
            "id": "character_font_size_input",
            "type": "input",
            "text": "12 pt",
            "value": "12",
            "meta": { "unit": "pt" },
            "actions": ["onChange"]
          },
          { "id": "character_bold_button", "type": "button", "icon": "bold", "actions": ["onClick"] },
          { "id": "character_italic_button", "type": "button", "icon": "italic", "actions": ["onClick"] },
          { "id": "character_underline_button", "type": "button", "icon": "underline", "actions": ["onClick"] },
          { "id": "character_strikethrough_button", "type": "button", "icon": "strikethrough", "actions": ["onClick"] },
          { "id": "character_shadow_button", "type": "button", "icon": "shadow", "actions": ["onClick"] },
          { "id": "character_outline_button", "type": "button", "icon": "outline", "actions": ["onClick"] },
          { "id": "character_font_color_button", "type": "button", "icon": "font_color", "actions": ["onClick"] },
          { "id": "character_highlight_color_button", "type": "button", "icon": "highlight_color", "actions": ["onClick"] },
          { "id": "character_increase_font_size_button", "type": "button", "icon": "increase_font_size", "actions": ["onClick"] },
          { "id": "character_decrease_font_size_button", "type": "button", "icon": "decrease_font_size", "actions": ["onClick"] },
          { "id": "character_superscript_button", "type": "button", "icon": "superscript", "actions": ["onClick"] },
          { "id": "character_subscript_button", "type": "button", "icon": "subscript", "actions": ["onClick"] },
          { "id": "character_clear_formatting_button", "type": "button", "icon": "clear_formatting", "actions": ["onClick"] }
        ]
      },
      {
        "id": "paragraph_section",
        "type": "collapsible_section",
        "text": "Parágrafo",
        "state": "expanded",
        "components": [
          { "id": "paragraph_align_left_button", "type": "button", "icon": "align_left", "actions": ["onClick"] },
          { "id": "paragraph_align_center_button", "type": "button", "icon": "align_center", "actions": ["onClick"] },
          { "id": "paragraph_align_right_button", "type": "button", "icon": "align_right", "actions": ["onClick"] },
          { "id": "paragraph_justify_button", "type": "button", "icon": "justify", "actions": ["onClick"] },
          { "id": "paragraph_line_spacing_button", "type": "button", "icon": "line_spacing", "actions": ["onClick"] },
          { "id": "paragraph_bullets_button", "type": "button", "icon": "bullets", "actions": ["onClick"] },
          { "id": "paragraph_numbering_button", "type": "button", "icon": "numbering", "actions": ["onClick"] },
          { "id": "paragraph_decrease_indent_button", "type": "button", "icon": "decrease_indent", "actions": ["onClick"] },
          { "id": "paragraph_increase_indent_button", "type": "button", "icon": "increase_indent", "actions": ["onClick"] },
          { "id": "paragraph_background_color_button", "type": "button", "icon": "background_color", "actions": ["onClick"] },
          {
            "id": "spacing_label",
            "type": "label",
            "text": "Espaço:"
          },
          {
            "id": "spacing_before_input",
            "type": "input",
            "text": "0,00 cm",
            "value": "0.00",
            "meta": { "unit": "cm" },
            "actions": ["onChange"]
          },
          {
            "id": "spacing_after_input",
            "type": "input",
            "text": "0,00 cm",
            "value": "0.00",
            "meta": { "unit": "cm" },
            "actions": ["onChange"]
          },
          {
            "id": "indent_label",
            "type": "label",
            "text": "Recuo:"
          },
          {
            "id": "indent_first_line_input",
            "type": "input",
            "text": "0,00 cm",
            "value": "0.00",
            "meta": { "unit": "cm" },
            "actions": ["onChange"]
          },
          {
            "id": "indent_before_text_input",
            "type": "input",
            "text": "0,00 cm",
            "value": "0.00",
            "meta": { "unit": "cm" },
            "actions": ["onChange"]
          },
          {
            "id": "indent_after_text_input",
            "type": "input",
            "text": "0,00 cm",
            "value": "0.00",
            "meta": { "unit": "cm" },
            "actions": ["onChange"]
          }
        ]
      }
    ]
  },
  {
    "id": "status_bar",
    "type": "status_bar",
    "region": "footer",
    "components": [
      {
        "id": "save_status_icon",
        "type": "icon",
        "icon": "save"
      },
      {
        "id": "page_info",
        "type": "label",
        "text": "Página 1 de 1"
      },
      {
        "id": "word_count",
        "type": "label",
        "text": "0 palavra, 0 caractere"
      },
      {
        "id": "page_style",
        "type": "label",
        "text": "Estilo de página Padrão"
      },
      {
        "id": "language_selector",
        "type": "label",
        "text": "Português (Brasil)",
        "actions": ["onClick"]
      },
      {
        "id": "view_mode_button_single",
        "type": "button",
        "icon": "single_page_view",
        "actions": ["onClick"]
      },
      {
        "id": "view_mode_button_multiple",
        "type": "button",
        "icon": "multiple_page_view",
        "actions": ["onClick"]
      },
      {
        "id": "zoom_out_button",
        "type": "button",
        "icon": "zoom_out",
        "actions": ["onClick"]
      },
      {
        "id": "zoom_slider",
        "type": "slider",
        "value": "100",
        "meta": { "unit": "%" },
        "actions": ["onChange"]
      },
      {
        "id": "zoom_in_button",
        "type": "button",
        "icon": "zoom_in",
        "actions": ["onClick"]
      },
      {
        "id": "zoom_percentage",
        "type": "label",
        "text": "100%"
      }
    ]
  }
]
